Security SentriesÔÉÅ

Parslet includes lightweight security checks called Defcons.

Defcon 1

Validates changed Python files in pull requests to ensure they do not use dangerous functions like exec or os.system.

Defcon 2

Provides a sandbox_task decorator that prevents tasks from using modules such as os or subprocess at runtime.

Defcon 3

Attaches a trap to the DAGRunner that freezes the DAG and writes a crash.log if an uncaught exception bubbles up.
